game.name: Boat Jigsaw
game.description:
Hey boys! You cannot ignore playing this brand new arcade challenge where you have to practice your brain power and puzzle-solving abilities in a unique style. Boat Jigsaw is definitely a right choice to play especially to those who are the biggest lover of jigsaw puzzles. Like many other puzzle challenges you have played ever, it also includes instances where you will be rewarded for your each successful effort. Give it a try to enjoy an amazing puzzle experience!

Your primary objective in this free online html5 puzzle game is to connect all the pieces together to complete a picture. When you enter the play button, you would have the choices of playing with 25 pieces, 49 pieces or 100 pieces. Of course, the difficulty level will be more challenging in the last one as compared to the first one. Solving each puzzle will reward you with some points and money through which you can also earn more pictures featuring different types of boats. 

Completing more pictures will help to keep your brain sharp and improve your hand-eye coordination power. Try to sort out the first picture and grab at least $1,000 to buy one of the following images in this fun skill game! There are three modes to play through for each picture. Get ready to earn more money in the hardest mode and bring more fun and pleasure to you! Check out more jigsaw puzzle-based arcade games for boys and girls on atmegame.com and kill your time without download!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE THE PIECES AND ADD TO MAKE THE COMPLETE IMAGE
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO JOIN THE JIGSAW PICES TO COMPLETE THE IMAGE
